article.title: Northrop Grumman to Provide MRAP Networking Kits
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corp., Herndon, Virginia, was awarded a $27,345,564 firm-fixed-price, multi-year contract for point-of-presence A-Kits (maximum quantity 111) and soldier network extension A-Kits (maximum quantity 525). A-Kits are a critical component of the network vehicle integration upgrade for the Mine Resistant Ambush Protected (MRAP) A-ATV. Army Contracting Command, Warren, Michigan, is the contracting activity (W56HZV-14-D-0065).
